meanings.definition: Baked or dried by the sun.
meanings.sent1: The sunbaked earth cracked under the heat.
meanings.sent2: The sunbaked clay hardened into a solid form.
meanings.sent3: The sunbaked ground felt like a giant cookie in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was as sunbaked as the desert sand.
meanings.sent5: The sunbaked rocks shimmered in the afternoon light.

meanings.sent1: The sunbaked walls of the house retained warmth.
meanings.sent2: The sunbaked pavement radiated heat in the summer.
meanings.sent3: The sunbaked car looked like it had a golden tan.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as sunbaked as a field of wheat.
meanings.sent5: The sunbaked roof glowed under the midday sun.
